about_the_game:
Get wrecked, shipwrecked.

In this charming 2D game, you'll be addicted to catching fish 'n' bubbles.

The cat and dog duo has devised a plan to catch delicious fish. Rupert hates water, but to keep from starving and most importantly to keep Riley from looking at him as dinner he is gearing himself up for the task. The object of the game is to capture the fish that come as orders from Riley on the boat with your bubble gun and turn them in without losing all your oxygen.


Riley’s Fish orders are located at the top of the screen in a particular order and you must capture the fish using a gun that produces bubbles in order to beat the level. However, along with fish that needs to be captured there are also other challenges on each level. Rupert must keep up with Riley as he moves forward, but watch out for enemy fish and obstacles!

Luckily, Rupert has rigged his bubble gun to fire pearls at them as he collects Riley’s ever growing list of fish he wants and Riley has to do something with all those fish bones! To make Rupert’s fishing task a bit easier he obtains more powerful bubble weapons as each Island increases in difficulty. There are also power-ups located in the luggage that can be purchased with in-game coin to help Rupert out.

This isn’t your typical laid back fishing trip, no sir. However, Rupert and Riley are so caught up in catching fish that they don’t realize they might be an even bigger catch themselves. Just be wary of greater enemies that lurk in dark places, stay savvy and good luck!

Features:

  • Addictive, adorable and comical game-play
  • 20 levels of satisfying bubble fun!
  • 5 Islands, each with a different weapon, environment, and obstacles!
  • Mini-games and bosses for each Island
  • Unlockable achievements
  • Great Soundtrack

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit Debian based
  • Processor: 1 gigahertz (GHz)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.5.0
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Rupert and Riley Shipwrecked

  • Processor: 1 gigahertz (GHz)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Help Rupert and Riley survive by catching delicious fish in this addictive underwater shooting adventure! Enjoy 20 levels and unique bosses on each island.
